name: SigningGroups_GetSigningGroup
description: Retrieves information, including group member information, for the specified signing group.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$block: Contains details about a signing group. Signing groups enable you to send an envelope to a predefined group of recipients and have any one member of the group sign your documents. When you send an envelope to a signing group, anyone in the group can open it and sign it with their own signature.

$ul: **created**: The UTC DateTime when the signing group was created. This property is read-only.
**createdBy**: The name of the user who created the signing group. This property is read-only.
**errorDetails**: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.
**errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
**groupEmail**: The email address for the signing group. You can use a group email address to email all of the group members at the same time.
**groupType**: The type of the group. The only valid value for this request is `sharedSigningGroup`.
**modified**: The UTC DateTime when the signing group was last modified. This property is read-only.
**modifiedBy**: The user ID (GUID) of the user who last modified this user record. This property is read-only.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
